com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.shardedjob

Class ShardedJobRunner<T extends IncrementalTask>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.shardedjob.ShardedJobRunner<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of tasks that the job being processed consists of
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShardedJobHandler

    public class ShardedJobRunner<T extends IncrementalTask>
extends Object
implements ShardedJobHandler
    Contains all logic to manage and run sharded jobs. This is a helper class for ShardedJobServiceImpl that implements all the functionality but assumes fixed types for <T>.
    Author:
    ohler@google.com (Christian Ohler)
